languages.text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, когда противник перемещается на соседнюю клетку с {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангардом{/g}, считая его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}, авангард совершает против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Once per round, whenever an enemy that considers the Vanguard a priority target enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity.
Once per round, whenever an enemy that considers the Vanguard a priority target enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an attack of opportunity.

languages.text: Один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, когда противник перемещается на соседнюю клетку с {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангардом{/g}, считая его {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}, авангард совершает против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Один раз за раунд, когда противник перемещается на соседнюю клетку с авангардом, считая его приоритетной целью, авангард совершает против него атаку по возможности.
Один раз за раунд, когда противник перемещается на соседнюю клетку с авангардом, считая его приоритетной целью, авангард совершает против него атаку по возможности.

languages.text: 当将{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}的敌人进入先锋邻近的格子时，该敌人会引发一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可触发一次。
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当将先锋视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}的敌人进入先锋邻近的格子时，该敌人会引发一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}可触发一次。

languages.text: Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, cada vez que un enemigo que considere al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} entre en una casilla adyacente a él, dicho enemigo provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, cada vez que un enemigo que considere al vanguardia un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} entre en una casilla adyacente a él, dicho enemigo provoca un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} provoziert ein Feind, der die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} ansieht und sich auf ein an die Vorhut angrenzenden Feld bewegt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriff{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Einmal pro Runde{/g} provoziert ein Feind, der die Vorhut als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} ansieht und sich auf ein an die Vorhut angrenzenden Feld bewegt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g}.

languages.text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, lorsqu'un ennemi qui considère le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} comme une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} accède à une case adjacente à celui-ci, il provoque une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, lorsqu'un ennemi qui considère le Patrouilleur comme une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} accède à une case adjacente à celui-ci, il provoque une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1回、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}としている敵がヴァンガードに隣接するセルに入った時、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, whenever an enemy that considers the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} enters a cell adjacent to the Vanguard, that enemy provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1回、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}としている敵がヴァンガードに隣接するセルに入った時、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir kez, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}'yü {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedef{/g} kabul eden bir düşman, Öncü'nün bitişiğindeki bir hücreye adım atarsa bir {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısını{/g} tetikler.
